I'll need to take some time to think on that.

column1: How to view or amend my personal details?
column2:
(1) Go to MyUwe and click on My Details

Then select Personal Details from the drop menu

(2) You should then be able to see and amend your personal details

column1: How to I change my photo ID?
column2:
(1) Go to MyUwe and click on My Details

Then select ID Photo from the drop menu

(2) You should then be able to see instructions on how to change your photo ID

column1: How do I change my address?
column2:
(1) Go to MyUwe and click on My Details

Then select Addresses from the drop menu

(2) You should then be able to see instructions on how to update your address

column1: How do I get a car parking pass?
column2:
(1) Go to MyUwe and click on My Details

Then select Car Parking from the drop menu

(2) You should then be able to see instructions on how to get your car parking pass

column1: How do I download evidence of my UWE status?
column2:
(1) Go to MyUwe and click on My Details

Then select Documents from the drop menu

(2) You should then be able to download your UWE status letter

column1: How to I make tution payments?
column2:
(1) Go to MyUwe and click on My Details

Then select Payments from the drop menu

(2) You should then be to see your tution charges and make payment if required

column1: I need to change my address, how do i go about it?
column2:
